title: Endeavor
description: Nothing can stop Emma Baldwin. This grad student doesn’t have time for nonsense. Grady Daniels is on a collision course with his demons. Since losing his famous racecar driver father in a crash, he has become known as a womanizing indie rockstar. When Emma enters his orbit, he sees her as his next conquest. But the driven Emma is no starstruck groupie. Yet, the sparks between the academic achiever and the sexy front man are too strong to ignore. Just when things start to heat up, a stalker enters the picture, and Emma’s life hangs in the balance. Grady swore never to get behind the wheel, but it might be the only way to save the woman he never expected to love.S.E. Rose’s Endeavor is a steamy, riveting, captivating contemporary romance written in K. Bromberg’s Driven Worlds project.
author: S.E. Rose
